title: Jacket
description: black with dark (blue and red) woven and embroidered bands across shoulders, around sleeves and front openings; design on PL opening is longer than PR; pounded indigo; front longer than back; cuffs; bands of trim, back corners; black front, dark red back; hemmed back bottom edge
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
